oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman Paintings, given by Colonel Durnfold to His Excellency Sir Bartle Frere. By /han kass'o (L VIII.
8004). |han kass'o describes a copy of rock painting No. 9, in which he thinks that the people depicted are 'Kafirs', or black people.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on rock painting copy no. 9
